quotes.quote: We are imprisoned in life in the company of persons powerfully unlike us.
Alienation as our present destiny is achieved only by outrageous violence perpetrated by human beings on human beings.
Disconnection or alienation from the past has political consequences.
The alienation of man thus appeared as the fundamental evil of capitalist society.
This whole theory of alienation that intellectuals have been passing on, really is just to stop a lot of ham acting. If you fill something with a proper emotion, it didn't worry him at all.
Not knowing where your food comes from is a primary form of alienation.
There is a terrible alienation in the ordinary man between what he is being told and what he secretly believes.
Modern humanity's sense of alienation lies in the fact that we have cut ourselves adrift from both the natural world and from the roots of our past.
Mankind's self-alienation has reached such a degree that it can experience its own destruction as an aesthetic pleasure of the first order.

We are born into a world where alienation awaits us. We are potentially men, but are in an alienated state, and this state is not simply a natural system. Alienation as our present destiny is achieved only by outrageous violence perpetrated by human beings on human beings.
To a man utterly without a sense of belonging, mere life is all that matters. It is the only reality in an eternity of nothingness, and he clings to it with shameless despair.
It is really an alienation to believe that learning is the result of teaching.
All separation, every kind of estrangement and alienation is false. All is one.
It's such a profound alienation for a person not to be at home in their own body.
There is no alienation that a little power will not cure.
When we bury our feelings, we also bury ourselves. It means we exist in a state of alienation. We rarely know it, but we are lonely for ourselves.
We live in a time where there's an alienation factor. There's a certain disconnection. We don't have any real sense of community anymore.
Without alienation, there can be no politics.
Alienation produces eccentrics or revolutionaries.
Young alienation, disappointment and heartache is all a part of the first real growing up that we do.
To ward off alienation and gloom, it is only necessary to remember the unremembered heroes of the past, and to look around us for the unnoticed heroes of the present.
Alienation and loneliness plant the seeds for rebellion and consciousness.
Loneliness is caused by an alienation from life. It is a loneliness from your real self.
Alienation, I suppose, can't be hackneyed because it will always exist.
Alienation is a form of living death. It is the acid of despair that dissolves society.
